revised_title: Fossil Remains of an Animal More Nearly Allied to Fishes
tldr: The author describes the fossil remains of an animal more closely related to fishes than other animal classes. The specimen was found in Dorsetshire, England, and provides insight into the evolution of vertebrates and the history of Earth. The author discusses the similarities and differences between this animal and known fish species, suggesting that it serves as a connecting link between different classes of animals.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Evolution and Paleontology
